The Last Airbender: The Legend of Korra USA (working title)

1.title: After All These Years
1.plot: The Metal Clan's new leader Kuvira is making some big changes. In Republic City, people are waiting to see Korra again but something is wrong.

2.title: Korra Alone
2.plot: While Korra is struggling with PTSD by the metal poison Zaheer injected in her, she sets off on a journey to try to connect with Raava. Amidst all of this, Tenzin and the others realize that Korra has gone missing after 6 months.

3.title: The Coronation
3.plot: The Coronation of the new King of Earth Kingdom while Kuvira does not agree with it. While on other hand Korra is practicing with Toph to better herself.

4.title: The Calling
4.plot: The airbender children, Jinora, Ikki and Meelo, head out to find the Avatar. Meanwhile, Toph teaches Korra to let go of the past.

5.title: Enemy at the Gates
5.plot: Kuvira threatens Zaofu; Bolin is caught in the middle of the bad blood between Su Beifong and Kuvira.

6.title: The Battle of Zaofu
6.plot: Korra returns to her role as the avatar, but is she really ready for action? Bolin and Varrick break away from Kuvira's army.

7.title: Reunion
7.plot: Korra returns to Republic city and team avatar faces their first mission together in 3 years when prince Wu goes missing. Bolin and Varick are on the lam.

8.title: Remembrances
8.plot: Wu begins his exile with Mako's family, and realizes that he knows nothing about his bodyguard. So Mako tells him the story of how he met Korra and their relationship since then, effectively catching the audience up from book 1- now.

9.title: Beyond the Wilds
9.plot: The spirit vines in Republic City start abducting people and it's up to Korra to figure out why.

10.title: Operation Beifong
10.plot: Bolin helps Opal and Lin save the Beifongs from Kuvira. Korra visits the Spirit World looking for help.

11.title: Kuvira's Gambit
11.plot: Korra and Team Avatar try to stop Kuvira from moving against Republic City.

12.title: Day of the Colossus
12.plot: Team Avatar clashes with Kuvira on the streets of Republic City; Pema and Prince Wu help evacuate innocent citizens.

13.title: The Last Stand
13.plot: When Korra comes face to face with Kuvira, the fate of the Earth Kingdom and the Avatar's life are at stake.

1.title: Welcome to Republic City
1.plot: Korra, the new Avatar, travels to Republic city to start her Airbending training.

2.title: A Leaf in the Wind
2.plot: Against Tenzin's prohibition, a frustrated Korra sneaks out to visit the pro-bending sports arena.

3.title: The Revelation
3.plot: Korra attempts to infiltrate the Equalist movement and learn more about its mysterious leader.

4.title: The Voice in the Night
4.plot: Korra becomes part of Councilman Tarrlok's task force which aims to rid Republic City of the Equalists.

5.title: The Spirit of Competition
5.plot: As Asami steals Mako's heart, Korra struggles to express her feelings for Mako and also at the same time Bolin tries to win Korra's heart by being brave enough to ask Korra to go out with him. The tension gets higher as the Pro bending tournament starts.

6.title: And the Winner Is...
6.plot: Korra and the Fire Ferrets are in the pro-bending championship, but will the Equalists allow the game to go on?

7.title: The Aftermath
7.plot: Korra suspects that an ally is working with the Equalists.

8.title: When Extremes Meet
8.plot: Korra faces off with Councilman Tarrlok as Equalist activity continues to rise in Republic City.

9.title: Out of the Past
9.plot: After being imprisoned by Tarrlok, Korra attempts to analyze the mysterious visions she has been having. Meanwhile, Tenzin, Lin, Mako, Bolin and Asami search for Korra, having been given false information by Tarrlok.

10.title: Turning the Tides
10.plot: The Equalists begin their attack on Republic City.

11.title: Skeletons in the Closet
11.plot: Korra and the rest of Team Avatar go into hiding in Gommu's underground shelter where benders and non-benders live together in harmony.

12.title: Endgame
12.plot: The duel between Amon and Korra - will Korra be powerful enough to beat Amon?

1.title: Rebel Spirit
1.plot: Korra struggles to find a deeper connection with the Spirit World as she and the gang attend a Southern Water Tribe festival.

2.title: The Southern Lights
2.plot: Korra and Chief Unalaq journey into a dangerous maelstrom and find a source of great spiritual power.

3.title: Civil Wars: Part 1
3.plot: While tensions flare between the Northern and Southern Water Tribes, Korra struggles to remain neutral.

4.title: Civil Wars: Part 2
4.plot: When Korra's parents are wrongfully arrested, Korra fights for their freedom.

5.title: Peacekeepers
5.plot: When the President of the United Republic refuses to help Korra, she decides to take matters into her own hands.

6.title: The Sting
6.plot: When Triad activity threatens to put Future Industries out of business, Mako performs an investigation and discovers a much bigger conspiracy.

7.title: Beginnings, Part 1
7.plot: Korra learns about the epic and mythic origins of the first Avatar.

8.title: Beginnings, Part 2
8.plot: Korra delves deeper into the Avatar's past and realizes what she must do in order to restore balance between the physical and spirit worlds.

9.title: The Guide
9.plot: Korra seeks Tenzin's help to enter the Spirit World for the first time.

10.title: A New Spiritual Age
10.plot: Korra enters the Spirit World and struggles with the Avatar's relationship with the spirits.

11.title: Night of a Thousand Stars
11.plot: When President Raiko is attacked, Bolin saves the day.

12.title: Harmonic Convergence
12.plot: Korra and company attempt to close the spirit portals before Harmonic Convergence.

13.title: Darkness Falls
13.plot: Korra discovers a new twist in Unalaq's evil plan. Meanwhile, Tenzin realizes he must face his own demons in order to save his daughter.

14.title: Light in the Dark
14.plot: Korra discovers a way she may be able to defeat the ultimate dark spirit and save the world.

1.title: A Breath of Fresh Air
1.plot: As Korra tries to restore the streets of Republic city, she learns that her decision to keep the spirit portals open has created a new conflict between humans and spirits, and triggered the emerging of new Airbenders.

2.title: Rebirth
2.plot: As the Avatar team faces difficulties while searching for new airbenders, Zaheer makes the next step in his plan.

3.title: The Earth Queen
3.plot: Korra and Asami collect tax money for Queen Hou Ting. Mako and Bolin suffer an unexpected family reunion. Kai can't get rid of his old habit. Lord Zuko visits a secret prison in Northen Water Tribe.

4.title: In Harm's Way
4.plot: Korra finds out that the Earth Queen imprisoned airbenders to create an army. Jenora leads an investigation with her spiritual projection. Lin joins the Avatar Team.

5.title: The Metal Clan
5.plot: Korra, Mako, Bolin and Asami visit Sao Fu, the city of Metal Clan. Lin does not want to meet her past. Suyin tells her life story. Air Temple Island training camp has a new recruit.

6.title: Old Wounds
6.plot: Korra practices metal bending. Lin takes an acupuncture session. Zaheer, Ghazan, Ming-Hua and P'Li escape Republic City.

7.title: Original Airbenders
7.plot: Though contending with Bumi's bad attitude, Tenzin tries to train the new members of the Air Nation.

8.title: The Terror Within
8.plot: As Opal leaves for the Northern Air Temple to start her airbending training, Zaheer and his gang try to kidnap Korra. Although Korra's friends are able to prevent this following a climactic fight, they suspect that someone inside Zaofu has been aiding the enemy.

9.title: The Stakeout
9.plot: While tracking Aiwei, Korra finds out more about Zaheer's motivations and purposes. Team Avatar is chased by both Zaheer's gang and the Earth Queen.

10.title: Long Live the Queen
10.plot: Korra and Asami are captured by Earth Kingdom forces and held in an airship en route to Ba Sing Se, and Asami's escape plan leads to a worse situation.

11.title: The Ultimatum
11.plot: As Ba Sing Se continues to erupt into chaos, Mako and Bolin struggle to leave the city to deliver Zaheer's message to Korra they were going to attack the Northern Air Temple.

12.title: Enter the Void
12.plot: Team Avatar hatches a plan to save the Airbenders, but all is not what it seems like. Zaheer rediscovers an old Airbender talent. The motive of the Red Lotus is finally revealed.

13.title: Venom of the Red Lotus
13.plot: After being captured and poisoned by the Red Lotus, Korra must fight to keep herself from being killed in the Avatar State, which would end the entire Avatar Cycle forever.

imdb.plot outline: Taking place 70 years after the events of "Avatar: The Last Airbender," this story follows the adventures of the Avatar after Aang - a passionate, rebellious, and fearless teenage girl from the Southern Water Tribe named Korra. With three of the four elements under her belt (Earth, Water, and Fire), Korra seeks to master the final element, Air. Her quest leads her to the epicenter of the modern "Avatar" world, Republic City - a metropolis that is fueled by steampunk technology. It is a virtual melting pot where benders and non-benders from all nations live and thrive. However, Korra discovers that Republic City is plagued by crime as well as a growing anti-bending revolution that threatens to rip it apart. Under the tutelage of Aang's son, Tenzin, Korra begins her airbending training while dealing with the dangers at large.
imdb.title: The Legend of Korra
plot: Avatar Korra fights to keep Republic City safe from the evil forces of both the physical and spiritual worlds.::rball4042

Taking place 70 years after the events of "Avatar: The Last Airbender," this story follows the adventures of the Avatar after Aang - a passionate, rebellious, and fearless teenage girl from the Southern Water Tribe named Korra. With three of the four elements under her belt (Earth, Water, and Fire), Korra seeks to master the final element, Air. Her quest leads her to the epicenter of the modern "Avatar" world, Republic City - a metropolis that is fueled by steampunk technology. It is a virtual melting pot where benders and non-benders from all nations live and thrive. However, Korra discovers that Republic City is plagued by crime as well as a growing anti-bending revolution that threatens to rip it apart. Under the tutelage of Aang's son, Tenzin, Korra begins her airbending training while dealing with the dangers at large.::Nickelodeon Publicity

Set 70 years after the events of "Airbender", Korra moves to Republic City to master her final element - air. With the guidance of the previous avatar Aang's son Tenzin, she has to fight crime and face a growing anti-bending movement that threatens to rip the metropolis apart.::Anonymous
